componentName.description: The name of the component using useDropdown. For debugging purposes.

defaultOpen.description: If true, the dropdown is initially open.

onOpenChange.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be opened or closed.

open.description: Allows to control whether the dropdown is open. This is a controlled counterpart of defaultOpen.

contextValue.description: The value to be passed into the DropdownContext provider.
